## RequestHandlerContext interface

Plugin specific context passed to a route handler.

Provides the following clients and services: - [savedObjects.client](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectsclient.md) - Saved Objects client which uses the credentials of the incoming request - [savedObjects.typeRegistry](./opensearch-dashboards.isavedobjecttyperegistry.md) - Type registry containing all the registered types. - [opensearch.client](./opensearch-dashboards.iscopedclusterclient.md) - OpenSearch data client which uses the credentials of the incoming request - [opensearch.legacy.client](./opensearch-dashboards.legacyscopedclusterclient.md) - The legacy OpenSearch data client which uses the credentials of the incoming request - [uiSettings.client](./opensearch-dashboards.iuisettingsclient.md) - uiSettings client which uses the credentials of the incoming request - [uiSettings.auditor](./opensearch-dashboards.auditor.md) - AuditTrail client scoped to the incoming request

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RequestHandlerContext 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [core](./opensearch-dashboards.requesthandlercontext.core.md) | { savedObjects: { client: [SavedObjectsClientContract](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectsclientcontract.md)<!-- -->; typeRegistry: [ISavedObjectTypeRegistry](./opensearch-dashboards.isavedobjecttyperegistry.md)<!-- -->; }; opensearch: { client: [IScopedClusterClient](./opensearch-dashboards.iscopedclusterclient.md)<!-- -->; legacy: { client: [ILegacyScopedClusterClient](./opensearch-dashboards.ilegacyscopedclusterclient.md)<!-- -->; }; }; uiSettings: { client: [IUiSettingsClient](./opensearch-dashboards.iuisettingsclient.md)<!-- -->; }; auditor: [Auditor](./opensearch-dashboards.auditor.md)<!-- -->; } |  |
